name: Water Sort Puz - Color Game
description:
Water Sortpuz is the new free to play, addictive color sort puzzle game! Sort the colored liquids into the right bottles to solve this water sort puzzle with thousands of challenging levels!
Improve your memory and train your brain while having fun.

HOW TO PLAY
Water Sortpuz is an extremely easy-to-play THEMED color sorting game for all ages!
1. Your mission? Sort all liquids in their own bottles
2. Tap the bottles and begin mixing colors. The goal is for all the bottles to contain ONE color
3. Level up & earn coins to power-up and complete the most challenging levels

UNIQUE FEATURES
- Unlock 40+ fun BOTTLE SETS and more!
- Relax with over 30 beautiful puzzle BACKGROUNDS: Ocean, Northern Lights, Beach, Cherry Blossoms, and more!
- Move up the map by collecting coins and leveling up
- Progress even faster with special link game power-ups: Rollback, Restart, Color Inversion and adding tubes to pour new color liquids into
- Free to play and download
- Relaxing sound design
- Easy to Play Hard to Master
- Log in every day to collect your Daily Bonus!

BRAIN TRAINING BENEFITS
Inspired by the classic, sorting puzzles: Water Sort is bound to get your cogs turning, as well as offering a number of other mental health benefits.
- Acting as a “mind sport” - Water Color Sort is designed to train your brain while captivating you through challenging, themed levels
- Wind down after a long day by relieving stress & relaxing with an intuitive puzzle game
- Stimulate your brain in a low-stress environment with puzzles and incredibly cute graphics

Download now to play this free puzzle app on AppStore and enjoy one of the most relaxing and addictive games of 2023!
Show the world your mastery of space and color with Water Sortpuz today!
